page.title: 13THREE COUNTIES SHOW,MALVERN
page.content: The Three Counties Show is so called because of the three counties, Herefordshire,Worcestershire and Gloucestershire.It is held in Malvern which is 5 miles away from Cradley where we live.Dad gave my sister and me Â£5 to share and a programme each. Then we all split up deciding to meet at the arena for lunch at 12.00a.m. We went to the food stall first because there were lots of free samples.We then went looking around the colourful stands,selling things like jewellry,fruit,vegetables,toys, ice creams and horse-riding things. My friend was going to buy a whip but she did not bother.I bought a pair of pink earrings.While we were eating our lunch there was horse jumping and trotting going on.We went around to the stables behind the arena.There were lots of horses and ponies.
